member.name: N:Sudoku
member.summary: This namespace contains some basic sudoku classes, for example, means the puzzle contains no solution.

member.name: N:Sudoku.Constants
member.summary: This namespace contains the or values used for helping to construct sudoku implementations.

member.name: N:Sudoku.Data
member.summary: This namespace contains the metadata (basic implementations) of the sudoku game, such as a sudoku .

summary.para: This namespace contains the collections used for standing for a sudoku element, for example, means a serial of cells.
This namspace only contains s, which means these collections can only used for parameters or locals.

member.name: N:Sudoku.Data.Extensions
member.summary: This namespace contains extension methods for sudoku implementation elements.

member.name: N:Sudoku.Extensions
member.summary: This namespace contains the extension methods for the sudoku elements.

member.name: N:Sudoku.Data.Stepping
N:Sudoku.Diagnostics
member.summary: This namespace implements the information for diagnostics.

member.name: N:Sudoku.Drawing
member.summary: This namespace implements the drawing (using GDI+).

member.name: N:Sudoku.Drawing.Extensions
member.summary: This namespace contains the extension methods for the instance in the namespace .

member.name: N:Sudoku.Extensions
member.summary: This namespace contains extension methods for .NET basic types (i.e. built-in types).

member.name: N:Sudoku.Models
member.summary: This namespace contains the models for displaying sudoku information while generating or solving a puzzle, as a status recorder.

member.name: N:Sudoku.Recognitions
member.summary: This namespace contains the OCR tool APIs.

member.name: N:Sudoku.Solving
member.summary: This namespace contains the solving methods or instances.

member.name: N:Sudoku.Solving.Annotations
member.summary: This namespace contains the annotations for s to specify a special status.

member.name: N:Sudoku.Solving.BruteForces.Backtracking
member.summary: This namespace contains the backtracking algorithms for sudoku solving.

member.name: N:Sudoku.Solving.BruteForces.Bitwise
member.summary: This namespace contains the bitwise algorithms for sudoku solving.
member.remarks: Please note that the files in this namespace will use or call native codes implemented by C programming language, so these files will use native features such as s, function pointers, and so on.

member.name: N:Sudoku.Solving.BruteForces.Linqing
member.summary: This namespace contains the algorithms using LINQ for sudoku solving.

member.name: N:Sudoku.Solving.Checking
member.summary: This namespace contains methods for checking the features of a sudoku grid. For example, means whether the specified puzzle is a minimal puzzle.

member.name: N:Sudoku.Solving.Constants
member.summary: This namespace contains the or values for solving a sudoku.

member.name: N:Sudoku.Solving.Generating
member.summary: This namespace contains the methods for generating sudokus.

member.name: N:Sudoku.Solving.Manual
member.summary: This namespace contains the manual sudoku technique searcher or solver.

member.name: N:Sudoku.Windows
member.summary: This namespace contains the instances for interact with WPF windows.

member.name: N:System
member.summary: This namespace contains the C# core instances. But in this solution, the namespace will be extended with more new instances.

member.name: N:System.Collections.Generic
member.summary: This namespace contains C# core collections with generics. But in this solution, the namespace will be extended with more new instances.

member.name: N:System.Linq
member.summary: This namespace contains C# searching or querying objects on or . But in this solution, the namespace will be extended with more new instances.

member.name: N:System.Runtime.CompilerServices
member.summary: This namespace contains the instances used for C# compiler. But in this solution, the namespace will be extended with more new instances.

member.name: N:System.Text.RegularExpressions
member.summary: This namespace contains the instances used for regular expression checkers or matchers. But in this solution, the namespace will be extended with more new instances.

member.name: N:Sudoku.Solving.Manual.Alses
member.summary: This namespace contains ALS technique checkers or information instance.

member.name: N:Sudoku.Solving.Manual.Alses.Basic
member.summary: This namespace contains basic ALS technique checkers or information instance.

member.name: N:Sudoku.Solving.Manual.Alses.Mslses
member.summary: This namespace contains basic MSLS (or MSLS-like) technique checkers or information instance.

member.summary: This namespace contains chain technique checkers or information instance.

member.summary: This namespace contains exocets technique checkers or information instance.

member.summary: This namespace contains the feature eliminations for exocets.

member.summary: This namespace contains fish technique checkers or information instance.

member.summary: This namespace contains intersection technique checkers or information instance.

member.summary: This namespace contains last resort technique checkers or information instance.

member.summary: This namespace contains single-digit-pattern checkers or information instance.

member.name: N:Sudoku.Solving.Manual.Singles
member.summary: This namespace contains single technique checkers or information instance.

member.summary: This namespace contains subset technique checkers or information instance.

member.name: N:Sudoku.Solving.Manual.Symmetry
member.summary: This namespace contains technique checkers or information instance using symmetry to determine.

member.summary: This namespace contains uniqueness-test checkers or information instance.

member.summary: This namespace contains bivalue universal grave technique checkers or information instance.

member.summary: This namespace contains extended rectangle technique checkers or information instance.

member.name: N:Sudoku.Solving.Manual.Uniqueness.Loops

member.name: N:Sudoku.Solving.Manual.Uniqueness.Polygons
member.summary: This namespace contains unique polygon (I call them Borescoper's deadly patterns) technique checkers or information instance.
member.remarks: Why they called Borescoper's deadly patterns? The reason is that the technique with variants is regularizeds by my friend, nickname Borescoper.

member.name: N:Sudoku.Solving.Manual.Uniqueness.Qiu
member.summary: This namespace contains Qiu's deadly pattern technique checkers or information instance.

member.summary: This namespace contains wing technique checkers or information instance.

member.summary: This namespace contains irregualr wing technique checkers or information instance.
